title: League of Legends crashes as soon as I get in game (after loading screen)
body: Every time I enter a game of LoL, I have about 5 sec before it crashes to desktop. Occasionally it says that the AMD driver had stopped responding and has recovered. I recently changed my video card and power supply, but the problem still persists. The driver sometimes also stops responding when watching videos and then reappears after the screen flashes from black. My graphics card is Radeon RX-460, with intel-i5 processor and I do have the latest drivers. Let me know if theres any additional info I can post that will help.

replies.body: Thanks for the response. I am using Windows 7 however so I dont think that is the issue.

Thanks for the update!  This could be due to other factors then like bad drivers or even hardware issues.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for a series of steps to help get this resolved.  Hopefully, this will get you back in game.

Did you recently update to the Windows anniversary edition?  I've seen reports of this, and it may be caused by something with the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Try disabling it, and see if you notice a difference!
